channel.title: They Hunger:HL1 Mod help
channel.description: So for the past few days I have been trying to downlaod "They Hunger" onto my computer. I send it to the half-life folder in the steammaps folder each time but it has a message that says "it is in use" even though im not using it. Any help would be appriciated. I really want to play this mod! p.s. My computer runs on Windows 7.

item.title: They Hunger:HL1 Mod help
item.dc:creator: Brockley
item.description:
I only have the steam version unortunatly, i’ll try closing down some things in task manager and ill give the exact message.

EDIT:Here is the error message, when i click either yes or no it just flashes back up, i can only click cancel.

An error occurred extracting C:\Program Files (x86)\steam\steammaps\brockley44\half-life\Hunger\cl_dlls\client.dll (this file might currently be in use). Would you like to try copying the file again?

Read full topic

item.title: They Hunger:HL1 Mod help
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Also, if you have a non-steam copy of Half-Life, play it on that. I’ve got Half-Life on Steam, but I only ever play the WON version.

Read full topic

item.title: They Hunger:HL1 Mod help
item.dc:creator: Fuskox
item.description:
What is in use? Try to be more specific. CTRL + ALT + Delete and go into processes to see if you can end whatever is in use, then try to move the mod.

Read full topic

item.title: They Hunger:HL1 Mod help
item.dc:creator: Brockley
item.description:
So for the past few days I have been trying to downlaod “They Hunger” onto my computer. I send it to the half-life folder in the steammaps folder each time but it has a message that says “it is in use” even though im not using it. Any help would be appriciated. I really want to play this mod!
p.s. My computer runs on Windows 7.

Read full topic
